mapper.select: select t.value value, t.label label, t.type type, t.del_flag delFlag, t.sort sort from sys_dict t where t.type=#{type} and t.del_flag='0' order by t.sort desc

select
example.distinct
from T_MERCHANT
order by ${example.orderByClause}

LR_ID_NO = #{record.lrIdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
